Posts.Content: Jun 1, 2008 10:45AM OnAQuest wrote: Hi Swimangel72:  My port scar did not heal well either, even after they went back and redid it.  All my other incisions (from mastectomy and reconstruction) healed beautifully.  My skin on my chest is unfortunately not as smooth as the skin in the other areas.  I have my suspicions about why that is, but that's another whole topic for another day.  I did also suspect at the time that the weight of my remaining breast did tend to pull on it, interfering with healing.  I've had so many other things occupying my attention  over the past few years, that I haven't had time to bother going back about this yet again, even though it's really obvious, especially when I'm in a bathing suit.  Good luck! -- Shannon
Posts.Title: My port scar isn't healing swimangel72 swimangel72
